loginIssue1: Verify that you are using the correct email address and password.

Log in to your GoPass account.
ourHistoryText: GoPass was founded in 2024 with the goal of revolutionizing the ticket verification industry. Since then, we have grown rapidly and become a market leader, thanks to our advanced technology and commitment to customer safety and satisfaction.
ourMissionText: At GoPass, our mission is to provide a secure and reliable platform for ticket verification, ensuring that each ticket is authentic and valid. We strive to eliminate fraud and offer our users the peace of mind that their tickets are legitimate.
ourTeamText: Our team is composed of experts in technology, security, and customer service, all dedicated to providing the best possible experience for our users. We work tirelessly to improve our platform and stay at the forefront of the industry.
PolicyText2: To initiate a refund, please contact our support team with your purchase information and an explanation of the issue. Our team will review your request and provide a response within 3 to 5 business days.
PolicyText3: If you have any additional questions about our refund policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
qrCodeNotValid: The QR code is not valid
refundPolicyText1: If your ticket is marked as fake or invalid and was purchased through GoPass, the refund process will be initiated automatically. For more details, see our
sellStep1: Log in and select the "Resell Ticket" option.
sellStep3: Once verified, it will be listed for resale on our platform.
sellStep4: When resold, you will receive the payment securely in your account.
supportText: If you have any issues with the verification process or need assistance, our team is available to help you.
technicalSupportText: If you experience technical issues, check our
troubleshootingGuideIntro: If you are experiencing technical issues with the GoPass app, follow these steps to try to resolve them:
Upload a photo or digital file of your ticket.
verificationIssue1: Make sure the photo of your ticket is clear and legible.
verificationIssue2: Verify that the QR code is not damaged or blurry.
verificationIssue3: If the problem persists, contact our support team.
verifyStep1: Log in to your GoPass account.
verifyStep2: Enter the alphanumeric code found below the QR code.
verifyStep3: Wait for the system to verify the authenticity of your ticket and you're done.
veriyProfile: Complete the profile data, and you will be able to verify your phone number to buy tickets.
Wait for the system to complete the verification (this may take up to 24 hours).
welcomeText: Welcome to GoPass, your reliable solution for ticket verification.
Welcome to the GoPass help and support section.
We use advanced technology to authenticate tickets by connecting with official providers. When you upload a ticket, our system verifies it to ensure it is authentic.
What kind of tickets can I verify?
You have a verification section where you can check if your ticket is authentic or not.
You will receive a notification when the process is complete.
